title.rendered: Article in Southerly and Enlace Latino NC features Code the Dream

content.rendered: A new article — available in Spanish and English — details CTD developer Kevin Arevalo’s journey to a tech career, CTD’s work creating farmworker outreach apps, and the new tech cooperative Radiate Consulting NC. Read the piece in English here, lea el artículo en español aqui.

excerpt.rendered: A new article — available in Spanish and English — details CTD developer Kevin Arevalo’s journey to a tech career, CTD’s work creating farmworker outreach apps, and the new tech cooperative Radiate Consulting NC. Read the piece in English here, lea el artículo en español aqui.
